Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a light-brown pottery ribbed jar, the fabric is partially grey-black in section, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and limited remains of one line of incised Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394313) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394313)
